interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MAD | Cosmetic's Makeup Remover Cleansing Towelettes, Daily cleansing face wipes to remove waterproof mascara, alcohol free , with Vitamin E 25 count
Review Date: 2020/10/26
Store: JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JUST FOR TOTS BY MAD', 'Skin Type': 'Oily', 'Unit Count': '25.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 7.87 x 1.97 inches; 7.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '685757511926'}
Review Text: I was excited to get this product, but unfortunately it doesn't work at all. I don't put a lot of make up on. My make up routine is eyeliner, mascara and blush. This makeup remover towelettes doesn't have enough moisture to do the job right, and it dried out quickly as I was wiping my face with it. All it did was smudge the make up around my eyes leaving me with racoon eyes. Once my eyes started to feel irritated I stopped using it, and I used Garnier cleansing water with a cotton pad. I took a picture of the towelette and the cotton pad side by side to show how much make up this product left behind. Also, this cleanser smells so bad that I had to hold my breath when using it. I don't recommend this cleanser at all.
Review Title: Smells terrible, dries out quickly, doesn't remove make up
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
C'est Moi Gentle Cleansing Water | Gentle, Fragrance-Free Cleanser Removes Makeup and Refreshes Skin, Made with Cornflower Water, Aloe Vera, and Strawberry, Kiwi, and Apple Extracts | 5.9 fl oz.
C'est Moi
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone,Sensitive', 'Brand': "C'est Moi", 'Scent': 'Kiwi, Strawberry, Unscented, Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '1.84 x 1.84 x 6.06 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '039897626055'}
This cleanser removed my waterproof mascara and eyeliner effortlessly without leaving any residue behind, but left my skin feeling dry and tight. Of course that went away as soon as I applied my moisturizer. If you want something that removes make up quick and effectively then get this cleanser but don't expect your skin to feel soft and hydrated after using this.
Removes waterproof makeup effectively

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Preferences:** The user continues to favor gentle, effective cleansing products tailored for sensitive and acne-prone skin, with a strong emphasis on makeup removal, especially of waterproof products.

- **Product Characteristics:** They particularly appreciate fragrance-free options or products with mild scents derived from natural ingredients, underscoring their commitment to using gentle, non-irritating formulations.

- **Performance Expectations:** Effective makeup removal remains crucial, but the user is particularly sensitive to post-cleansing skin feel. They expect products to clear makeup without causing excessive dryness, and moisturizing properties post-cleansing are important to them.

- **Rating Tendency:** The user has shown a tendency to rate products around 4 stars but is also willing to give low ratings when products do not meet their standards, as demonstrated by a recent purchase rated only 1 star due to poor performance and an unpleasant scent.

- **Age and Demographics:** The marketing approach of the products they consider suggests the user is likely an adult.

In summary, this user seeks high-performing, gentle cleansing solutions specifically designed for sensitive skin, values pleasant sensory experiences, and is not afraid to critique products that fall short of expectations. Their previous experiences highlight a strong focus on effective makeup removal and overall skin comfort.
